title: My game would not load then I ended up losing lp from it
body: After champ select the game went to the normal loading screen but nothing would happen. Ten minutes later the game goes back to the client and I end up losing 7 lp because of this. Is this a bug? If so may I have my lp back?

replies.body:
Were you ever able to get reconnected to that match? If the game continued on without you joining, it would have marked you AFK which will still make you lose LP regardless of if your team won or lost. 

If this is happening more than just that one time, I want to go ahead and try troubleshooting this to help you make sure it doesn't happen again, or at least not as often. Let's start by adjusting your port forwarding and DNS settings, which you can find steps on how to do so in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Be sure to test that in a custom game and let me know if it lets you connect easier.
